Posts.Content: Hi Pat Sorry i did not reply earlier my computer is down so had to wait to use one I found the third week the most noticable , my head was sore and as i ran my fingers through it it was coming out  and yesterday as i blow dried my hair there was a pile by my feet and as i looked around my hair was everywhere i had been, so that was it , i got the clippers and went for it . I feel much better as my hair was so thin i could'nt do anything with it anyway , i go for my second chemo  tomorrow and im seeing my oncologist today so i thought ive got to face people may as well do it now. I am sure you will be ok for the wedding as mine really didnt do anything noticable until this week . I know what you mean about the control it has over us all my time seems to be ruled by appointments and injections , thats why i did my hair as i felt a had just abit of control over that ,i dont have a wig just hats, i have alot of animals and they dont judge so that makes life easier. Hope this helps How are you feeling after your chemo ? Claire x
Posts.Title: to shave or not to shave that is the question

Posts.Content: Hi Caryn Well i shaved my head on sunday as i couldnt stand leavind a trail of hair everywhere i went, so like you i used the dog clippers went to a number 1 but its still coming out as i had my 2nd fec on tuesday, my oncologist changed my meds as i was feeling so sick after the first one but this time i feel even worse ,so back to the drawing board !! Do you suffer from sickness ?  with your treatment its driving me mad i just want to be sick then im ok but what they have given me i cant so it goes on and on. I just wear a baseball cap and i have got some buff tubes , the best thing is how quick my hair dries time ive got out of the shower its done no faffing about with dryers . Take care claire x

Posts.Content: Hi I have had my first lot of FEC and apart from the sickness not too bad,got my second lot on tuesday  but my hair is starting to come  out more every day ,what i wanted to know is should i just bite the bullet and shave it myself or do i go to the hairdressers apart from the money is there going to be any  difference.?(my dad did kindly offer to use the sheep shears on me but i politely refused !!) Thanks x
